newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Zurich November securities turnover rises 2.2 pct.
newsitem.headline: Zurich November securities turnover rises 2.2 pct.

text.p: Securities turnover in Switzerland's biggest canton, Zurich, rose 2.2 pct in November from the month before to 51.31 billion Swiss francs, cantonal bourse authorities said.
Turnover was up 9.4 percent from November last year.
Cumulative turnover for the first 10 months of 1996 was 30.8 pct higher than last year at 537.41 billion francs.
The figures cover all trade in securities and securities derivatives on and off the bourse and on the Swiss Options and Financial Futures Exchange (Soffex).
